With @RepJayapal's Medicare for All Act of 2019, every woman, man, and child in this country is guaranteed coverage as a right. pic.twitter.com/W1CIiWJNoH
replies: Besides the question of how this is going to be paid for, this requires even more govt control over the healthcare/insurance industry. This is what has cause most of the problems in the first place. Also healthcare/insurance is not a right.
